title: What is the best acoustic piano to buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: One that you can afford, have tried out and love to play and will fit in your house. There can be no real recommendation because a piano is a very personal thing. It has to fit all your requirements. Last Thursday I took delivery of mine. I ordered it last January after researching a list of 5 grand pianos (and previously but then rejected some upright pianos and top of the range digital pianos - although I already have and intend to keep for silent practice a Kawai CA67). In order to fit the available space it had to be a baby grand, max length 170cm, in order to fit the budget it couldn’t be a premium German brand. I spent a couple of weeks trying (and in some cases retrying) those 5 grand pianos until I realised there was only one I really liked. So I am now the proud owner of a Feurich 162.  Slightly lost is the fact that this picture was taken in a dark room and there is a glow from the built in music desk lamp pointing up at the music
